Content.Text:
<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, I know you're there. I'm coming
in.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>. I'm here just like I said I
said I'd be. Now let's get going
already.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
We're here. You seem out of breath,
<MYNAME>. You okay?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, that's all right then.
<PAGE>
Now let's enjoy the beautiful starry
night together.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wow, it sure is pretty. It's not
everyday you get to  see something this
beautiful. 
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, what do ya think?
Looking up at the sky hurts my neck.
It's more beautiful than I expected.
I'm glad to see it with you, Allen.
I'll cherish this memory forever.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<MYNAME>, that's not very romantic, you
know.
<PAGE>
You're in front of nice scenery and
that's the best comment you can come up
with? It is you we're talking about...
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Then again, your neck hurts? You're
probably working too much. Don't over
do it now!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Yeah, you're right. I wasn't exactly too
into it when you asked me out for
this...
<PAGE>
But I guess looking at such a nice
scenery and chatting with you a bit
isn't all that bad, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh boy, <MYNAME>. You love me that much,
huh? How about a little a kiss then?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Hey now, don't look at me like that. I
was kidding. Now if we were dating, that
would be a different story.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Haha, that's an overreaction if I ever
heard one, <MYNAME>. Not that I don't
understand how you feel.
<PAGE>
I'm pretty sure I'll remember this
scenery for some time. I won't forget
that you were by my side either.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm starting to feel cold. We should
get going soon.
<PAGE>
I can't just let the lady I'm escorting
catch a cold.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
I had a pretty good time today. If you
don't have a man next year, I'll go with
you again, babe.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, bye, <MYNAME>. Be sure to get to bed
early tonight.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, it's me, Rod. I'm coming in.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hi, <MYNAME>. Let's go see the stars
just like we promised.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
We're here! Are you cold, <MYNAME>?
<PAGE>
We're pretty high up, so it feels even
colder than it does in town. Take care
not to catch a cold.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hey, <MYNAME>! Look! There are so
many stars!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Truly amazing, isn't it?
<PAGE>
What a romantic sight. It's enough to
forget about how cold it is. Don't you
think so, <MYNAME>?
It's so cold I can barely talk.
If only my sweetheart was beside me.
It's so beautiful I could cry.
I wish I borrowed a camera.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What's the matter, <MYNAME>. Oh, your
lips are shaking. I guess you really are
cold.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Here, <MYNAME>. My hands are warm, so
I'll warm your cheeks up.
<PAGE>
See? Aren't they warm? I'm glad I kept
my hands in my pocket the whole way
here.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Haha, you're right. If I were your
boyfriend, you might have felt even
happier, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Say, <MYNAME>. Is there anyone you like?
<PAGE>
What? You're not telling me? Oh, come
on! Now I won't be able to sleep because
I'll be thinking about it all night.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Well then, just tell me when you're
gonna cry. You will always have my
shoulder to cry on, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Oh, come on now. You didn't have to
laugh that much.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>I tried my best to sound cool. Hmm, I
guess I need more practice...

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Yeah, I guess we could have taken a
picture of us together to mark the
occasion.
<PAGE>
Oh, maybe I could brag to Allen then.
I could say I was on a date with a cute
girl.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>By the way, I wasn't kidding about that
part. I really think you're really cute,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
My neck's a bit tired from looking up
too much. Maybe we should go home now.
<PAGE>
Come on, <MYNAME>. Let's hold hands while
we climb down the mountain. I wouldn't
want you to slip.

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thank you so much for today. I had a
great time.
<PAGE>
If you're up for it, I'd love it if
you asked me to go again next year,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, <MYNAME>, good night. See you
tomorrow!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Yoo-hoo, <MYNAME>. It's me! I'm coming in.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh? Getting ready to go? What great
timing.
<PAGE>
Well, time's a-wastin'. Let's head for
the top of the mountain to see some
stars.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I-I'm so tired... We finally made it.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Still, you're pretty energetic,
<MYNAME>. You're making me feel old...

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Well, enough with the jokes. Let's look
at the stars. Ain't that a great sight
up there?

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This is amazing. It really is like an
ocean of stars.
<PAGE>
This is certainly worth seeing. I'm glad
I came.
I'm glad I asked you.
Let's come again next year.
That really energizes me.
Looking up at the sky hurts my neck.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
What?! Really?
<PAGE>
Oh, I'm sorry I responded the way I did
when you invited me. I didn't know.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I'll treat you to a nice meal to make it
up to you and as way to say thanks.
Think about what you want to eat, okay?

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
What?! Next year too?
<PAGE>
A date with such a cute girl... It
might be a bit too much for me at my
age.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Just kidding! I'll respond to you
officially next year.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, you're so considerate of me.
That's so nice of you!
<PAGE>
I feel so much better just hearing you
say that, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
Thank you, <MYNAME>. You made me a
really happy man.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Haha. Then I'll give you a neck
massage later.
<PAGE>
I've got a reputation for giving
professional-level massages, you know.
<PAGE>
I'll treat you to one as a way to thank
you for inviting me tonight.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
All right, let's head back. I'm sure
you're starting to get cold, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
I have some warm drinks for you at
home I can treat you. Well, let's go.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
I had so much fun today. Did you have
fun too, <MYNAME>?

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's good. Well, I'll get going now.
See you again, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, are you there? Please excuse
me.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hello, <MYNAME>. I have come so we may see
the stars just as I promised. Shall we
go?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
We're here. <MYNAME>, it is a bit dark, so
please watch your step.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Take a look, <MYNAME>. Can you believe
how many stars there are?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
All the stars are glittering brightly...
It's beautiful. Don't you think so
too, <MYNAME>?
Looking up at the sky hurts my neck.
It's so beautiful I could cry.
I'm glad to see it with you, Sanjay.
I'll cherish this memory forever.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Haha. Did you become enchanted by the
stars after looking up? That's something
a small child would do. How cute.
<PAGE>
Please let me see your neck. I can
massage it a little to help you feel
better.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Haha. You may cry all you want.
<PAGE>
I find ladies that cry at times like
this to be so very adorable.
<PAGE>
I have a handkerchief so tell me when
you need it. I will kindly wipe your
tears for you.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Right, and I'm very happy you asked me
to go with you.
<PAGE>
I really like speaking with you, <MYNAME>.
Please invite me out anytime.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Yes. I don't think I will ever forget
either, <MYNAME>. I won't forget the stars
nor your face gleaming with joy.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Hmm? It seems your face is red, <MYNAME>.
Is something the matter?
<PAGE>
If you are cold, I will lend you my
coat.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm starting to feel cold. Shall we
return?
<PAGE>
Come, <MYNAME>. Please take my hand. The
snowy paths are slippery at night.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thank you for such a splendid time
today.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, good night, <MYNAME>. Sweet dreams.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, ya there? I'm coming
in.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, aren't we going to go see the stars
today?
<PAGE>
It's cold, so let's make it quick and
head home early. Come on, let's get
outta here.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
We're here, <MYNAME>. Whoa, the winds
are strong at the top of the mountain.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hey! Look at that! There are so many
stars in the sky!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It's really pretty. The stars seem
to shine even brighter because it's
winter. Don't you think so, <MYNAME>?
It's so cold I can barely talk.
If only my sweetheart was beside me.
It's so beautiful I want to cry.
I wish I borrowed a camera.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Geez... What are you doing? Didn't you
bundle up before coming here?
<PAGE>
Oh, fine. You can borrow my scarf. Here,
wrap it around yourself.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>What? It feels warm? Of course it is.
I was just wearing it a minute ago.
<PAGE>
What? Don't grin like that when you're
wearing someone else's scarf.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Don't say it like that. You're the one
who invited me after all.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Geez... I wouldn't have said yes if
anyone else had asked me. Anyway, just
look at the stars already.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
H-Hey. Please don't cry.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>I don't know what to do if I ever see
you cry.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Just smile like you usually do. I'd feel
more at ease stay that way too.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You're right. We should have borrowed
one from Dunhill.
<PAGE>
If we did, I could take a striking photo
of you looking like a fool with your
mouth wide open.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Haha, I'm kidding. Calm down. I'll treat
you to something warm on the way back.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, we saw the stars, so it's time
to go back.
<PAGE>
Come on, give me your hand. The snowy
path is dangerous, ya know. Hold onto
me until we get all the way down.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I had a lot of fun today. Thanks.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, I'm going home now. See you later,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, are you here? I'm coming in.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Yoo-hoo. I'm here just like I promised!
<PAGE>
I hope the stars are out shining
tonight. I can't wait! Let's go!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
All right! We're here! As always, that
was a tough trek up the hill.
<PAGE>
Now then, let's see what kind of starry
sky we have tonight!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Wow! Look at that, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It's beautiful! I feel like I'm being
drawn into it!
<PAGE>
It might be the most beautiful night
sky I've ever seen in my life!
<PAGE>
Right, <MYNAME>? Aren't the stars
beautiful?
Glad you like them.
If only my sweetheart was beside me.
They're so beautiful I want to cry.
I'll cherish this memory forever.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Yeah! I feel really happy! It would be
 pretty strange if anyone saw a sight
like this and wasn't happy!
<PAGE>
I better thank you for inviting me out
here! <MYNAME>, you're a really good guy.
<PAGE>
I'll treat you to something nice to
thank you. Look forward to it!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Hold it right there! That's a horrible
thing to say after you invited me here!
You have a problem with me?
<PAGE>
If you can't see how charming I am, you
must have bad taste.
<PAGE>
You need to take a better look at me.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, are you okay? If you want to
cry, you can do it on my shoulder.
<PAGE>
You've always helped me so much, so
that's the least I could do!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Haha! Forever? That's nice to hear!
<PAGE>
I won't ever forget about this day
either! I'll remember our conversation
even when I turn old and grey!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I really don't want to, but maybe we
should go back. Time sure flies when
you're having fun!
<PAGE>
I wanted to talk to you more, <MYNAME>,
but maybe we should save it for next
time.

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thank you for inviting me out tonight!
I had a great Starry Night Festival
thanks to you.

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, see you later. Good night!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>! It's me, Michelle! I'm coming
in!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good evening! We promised to meet for
Starry Night Festival, right? Let's go!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Phew! We're finally here! I'm tired
already. I hope we'll get to see the
stars.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Wow, <MYNAME>. Look! Look!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It's such a beautiful starry sky! How
romantic!
<PAGE>
The stars are so big and glittery.
They're just like jewels!
You're much prettier, Michelle.
It's so cold I can barely talk.
I'm glad you like them.
I should have borrowed a camera.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, geez! Stop flattering me. You sure
are good with the sweet talk, <MYNAME>!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I can't help but feel embarrassed
when you compliment me! So please don't
stare at me like that.<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<MYNAME>, you're cold? Here, let me do
this for you.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>See? Aren't my hands warm? Do you feel
a little better now?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>
Tee-hee... You're turning red, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hee-hee. I'm always trying to make
other people happy but today it's just
the opposite. It's great!
<PAGE>
It's fun to just enjoy the flow
without thinking too much sometimes!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If only we had a camera, we could have
taken a picture together, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>
Let's bring a camera next year so we
take a commemorative photo.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, let's start to head home. If we
stay out here any longer, we'll catch a
cold.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thanks for inviting out here tonight!
I had so much fun!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, I'll see you later. Good night!

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, are you there? Please excuse me.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good evening, <MYNAME>. I'm sorry I kept
you waiting. Now shall we go and see
the stars?

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
We are here. The walk up the path to
the mountaintop went by quite quickly
since we were together.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Please take a look, <MYNAME>. There are
so many stars in the sky...

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It's beautiful. The scene of blinking
stars encased in the dark night sky
looks almost holy.
<PAGE>
I'm very glad I came tonight. What about
you, <MYNAME>?
Looking up at the sky hurts my neck.
It's so beautiful I could cry.
I'm glad to see it with you, Iroha.
I'll cherish this memory forever.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hehe. Did you become enchanted by the
stars after looking up? That's something
a small child would do. How cute.
<PAGE>
Anyway, Let me see your neck. I'll try
to massage it a little to soothe your
muscle pain.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Haha, feel free to cry. It would not
bother me at all.
<PAGE>
I have a handkerchief, so please tell me
if you need it.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
<MYNAME>! Wh-What are you saying? I feel
so embarrassed.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>B-But, I am very happy to hear you say
that. Thank you.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I will also never forget it. Neither the
starry sky nor the sight of you looking
so pleased, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
I hope you'll always remember tonight
too, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm starting to feel cold. Shall we
return home?

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thank you so much for a wonderful time
tonight.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, good night. May you have sweet
dreams...

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, it's me, Felicity. I'm coming
in.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, I've been looking forward to
tonight. Let's go see the stars just
like we said we would.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
We're here! <MYNAME>, are you cold?
<PAGE>
We're at a high altitude, so it's even
colder than back in town. We better make
sure we don't catch a cold.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>! Look up! The starry sky is
spectacular tonight!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Isn't it amazing? What a romantic
scenery.
<PAGE>
It's even to make me forget about the
cold. Don't you think so too, <MYNAME>?
It's so cold I can barely talk.
If only my sweetheart was beside me.
It's so beautiful could I cry.
I should have borrowed a camera.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What's the matter, <MYNAME>? Oh, your lips
are shaking. You really are cold, aren't
you?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Here, <MYNAME>. My hands are warm, so
I'll heat up your cheeks for you.
<PAGE>
See? Aren't they warm? I was holding
onto a hand warmer the whole way here.
I'm sure glad I did!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Haha, I guess so. If we were
sweethearts, we'd be so much happier
right now.
<PAGE>
By the way, is there anyone you have
feelings for, <MYNAME>?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>What? You won't tell me? Now I won't be
able to sleep tonight! I just have to
know.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If you feel like crying, you can cry on
my shoulder anytime.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Tee-hee... I actually would like to see
you cry at least once, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
I'm sure you have the most adorable
face when you cry.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You're right. It would have been nice to
take a commemorative photo together.
<PAGE>
Oh, I could have bragged to Tina that
I was on a date with a wonderful man.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>By the way, I wasn't joking about that.
I really do think you're just wonderful,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is your neck also getting strained from
staring up at the sky so much? Let's go
back soon.
<PAGE>
By the way, <MYNAME>. Do you mind if we
hold hands on the way down the mountain.
<PAGE>
It would be dangerous if I slipped on
the snowy path at night, so you better
escort me back home.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thank you so much for giving me a
wonderful date to remember tonight!
<PAGE>
I hope we'll be able to go together
again next year!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well then, <MYNAME>, good night. See you
tomorrow.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>. Oh, <MYNAME>! I'm coming in.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ta-da! I'm here, just like I promised.
Now let's go already!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Okay, we're there. Oh, <MYNAME>. It looks
like you're out of breath. You okay?

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Now let's go enjoy that night sky.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Wow, it sure is pretty. You don't see
something this nice every day.
<PAGE>
Don't you think so, <MYNAME>?
Looking up at the sky hurts my neck.
It's more beautiful than I expected.
I'm glad to see it with you.
I'll cherish this memory forever.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<MYNAME>! You sure aren't romantic, now
are you?!
<PAGE>
Can't you come up with something better
to say when you're in front of such nice
scenery?!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Anyway, you say your neck hurts, <MYNAME>?
I think you work too much. You've gotta
take breaks every now and then, ya know.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Isn't that the truth. I wasn't really up
for it when you invited me out here,
<MYNAME>...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>But it's been surprisingly fun to see
this great scenery and chat with you
under the stars, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What is it, <MYNAME>? You like me that
much, huh? Do you want a kiss?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Hey, what's with that reaction? I was
kidding. Don't take it seriously.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hohoho... You're always exaggerating,
<MYNAME>. Well, I do understand how
you feel.
<PAGE>
I don't think I'll forget this view
for a some time. I won't forget that you
were by my side either, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, I bet you're getting pretty
chilly. We should go back soon.
<PAGE>
This is a proper date after all, so you
better escort me back to my house.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
I had some fun today. I'll go with you
again next year... if I feel like it.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well then, <MYNAME>, good night.
